snippet: A high-profile Vatican commission on the prevention of child sexual abuse voted on Saturday to temporarily suspend one of its members.
abstract: Prominent victim of abuse by Catholic priest is suspended from serving on Vatican commission on prevention of child sexual abuse; Peter Saunders, who has been vocally critical of commission created by Pope Francis, refuses to step down after body votes in favor of his taking 'leave of absence.'

byline.original: By ELISABETTA POVOLEDO and LAURIE GOODSTEIN
byline.contributor: Elisabetta Povoledo reported from Rome, and Laurie Goodstein from New York.

lead_paragraph: A high-profile Vatican commission on the prevention of child sexual abuse voted on Saturday to temporarily suspend one of its members.

headline.main: Priest Abuse Victim Is Suspended From Vatican Panel
headline.print_headline: Priest Abuse Victim Is Suspended From Vatican Panel
